text: Paratu kujha gadagi tom ilava jihare vade papam ate asalilatam tom bacade hana besaka tuhade raba di khima be'ata vi'apaka hai. Uha tuhanu cagi tar'ham janada hai udom tom jadom usa ne tuhanu dharati te paida kita ate udom tom jadom tusim apani'am mavam de peta vica ika bharuna de rupa vica si. Tam tusim apane apa nu pavitara na samajho. Uha takava (sajamim) vali'am nu cagi tar'ham janada hai
